answers.answer: Hello,The pain and swelling in the thumb can be due to cellulitis(common after loss of nail),De Quervain’s tenosynovitis,arthrosis of the thumb joint or arthritis of the joint.It is difficult to confirm the diagnosis without investigations.I would suggest your friend to get blood tests and MRI of the hand  from an orthopedician to confirm the diagnosis.Hope it helps. Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional queries.

question: a friend ask me the other day about the pain in her thumb. she had lost her thumbnail , it grew back but now her thumb is swollen and she can't bend it. it is painful to try. what is her problem? she is about 60 years old and has diabetes and high blood pressure.
title: thumb pain
